0.text: Once upon a time, there was a young girl named ${this.state.name}. She loved to daydream and often would dream that she was a superhero and saving the world from an evil monster. One day, as she was playing around in her bedroom, she hears a sound coming from the closet.

children.buttonText: Tell your mom about the noise.

1a.text: ${this.state.name} decides to check out the sound. She timidly opens the doors of her closet, and to her surprise, all her clothes have been replaced by a whole new world. This new world is gray and cloudy. The voice is louder and sounds like â€œHelp! Help!

1b.text: ${this.state.name} decides to tell her mom. But her mom does not hear a sound and tells her she is just being silly. Despite her curiosity, ${this.state.name} decides not to explore the noise and the noise eventually fades away. She never hears the mysterious noise ever again. The end.
